datafield.subfield: BaF radical: A promising candidate for laser cooling and magneto-optical trapping

(ii) Spin-molecular rotation coupling \begin{equation*} \begin{align*} \begin{eqnarray}&&\begin{array}{l}\langle {v}{^{\prime} }{\Lambda }{^{\prime} }{N}{^{\prime} }(S){J}{^{\prime} }(I){F}{^{\prime} }{M}_{F}{^{\prime} }|{\gamma }_{\nu }{T}^{1}(\hat{S})\cdot {T}^{1}(\hat{N})|v\Lambda N(S)J(I)F{M}_{F}\rangle \\ ={\delta }_{{v}{^{\prime} }v}{\delta }_{{\Lambda }{^{\prime} }\Lambda }{\delta }_{{N}{^{\prime} }N}{\delta }_{{J}{^{\prime} }J}{\delta }_{{F}{^{\prime} }F}{\delta }_{{M}_{F}{^{\prime} }{M}_{F}}{\gamma }_{\nu }{(-1)}^{N+J+S}\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times {[S(S+1)(2S+1)]}^{1/2}{[N(N+1)(2N+1)]}^{1/2}\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times \left\{\begin{array}{ccc}\begin{array}{c}S\\ N\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}N\\ S\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}J\\ 1\end{array}\end{array}\right\}.\end{array}\end{eqnarray} \end{align*} \tag{ B2 } \end{equation*}

(iii) Magnetic hyperfine interaction (I) \begin{equation*} \begin{align*} \begin{eqnarray}&&\begin{array}{l}\langle {v}{^{\prime} }{\Lambda }{^{\prime} }{N}{^{\prime} }(S){J}{^{\prime} }(I){F}{^{\prime} }{M}_{F}{^{\prime} }|{b}_{F\nu }{T}^{1}(\hat{I})\cdot {T}^{1}(\hat{S})|v\Lambda N(S)J(I)F{M}_{F}\rangle \\ ={\delta }_{{v}{^{\prime} }v}{\delta }_{{\Lambda }{^{\prime} }\Lambda }{\delta }_{{N}{^{\prime} }N}{\delta }_{{F}{^{\prime} }F}{\delta }_{{M}_{F}{^{\prime} }{M}_{F}}{b}_{F\nu }{(-1)}^{{J}{^{\prime} }+F+I+J+N+1+S}\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times {\rm{\ }}{[(2{J}{^{\prime} }+1)(2J+1)S(S+1)(2S+1)]}^{1/2}\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times {\rm{\ }}{[I(I+1)(2I+1)]}^{1/2}\left\{\begin{array}{ccc}\begin{array}{c}I\\ J\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}{J}{^{\prime} }\\ I\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}F\\ 1\end{array}\end{array}\right\}\left\{\begin{array}{ccc}\begin{array}{c}J\\ S\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}S\\ {J}{^{\prime} }\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}N\\ 1\end{array}\end{array}\right\}.\end{array}\end{eqnarray} \end{align*} \tag{ B3 } \end{equation*}

\begin{equation*} \begin{align*} \begin{eqnarray}&&\begin{array}{l}\langle {v}{^{\prime} }{\Lambda }{^{\prime} }{N}{^{\prime} }(S){J}{^{\prime} }(I){F}{^{\prime} }{M}_{F}{^{\prime} }|-\sqrt{10}{g}_{S}{\mu }_{B}{g}_{N}{\mu }_{N}({\mu }_{0}/4\pi ){T}^{1}(\hat{S},{C}^{2})\\ \times {\rm{\ }}{T}^{1}(\hat{I})|v\Lambda N(S)J(I)F{M}_{F}\rangle \\ ={\delta }_{{v}{^{\prime} }v}{\delta }_{{\Lambda }{^{\prime} }\Lambda }{\delta }_{{N}{^{\prime} }N}{\delta }_{{F}{^{\prime} }F}{\delta }_{{M}_{F}{^{\prime} }{M}_{F}}(-\sqrt{30}/3){c}_{\nu }{(-1)}^{{J}{^{\prime} }+F+I+N}\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times {\rm{\ }}{[(2{J}{^{\prime} }+1)(2J+1)S(S+1)(2S+1)]}^{1/2}\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times {\rm{\ }}{[I(I+1)(2I+1)]}^{1/2}(2N+1)\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times {\rm{\ }}\left(\begin{array}{ccc}\begin{array}{c}N\\ 0\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}2\\ 0\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}N\\ 0\end{array}\end{array}\right)\left\{\begin{array}{ccc}\begin{array}{c}J\\ N\\ S\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}{J}{^{\prime} }\\ N\\ S\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}1\\ 2\\ 1\end{array}\end{array}\right\}\left\{\begin{array}{ccc}\begin{array}{c}I\\ J\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}{J}{^{\prime} }\\ I\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}F\\ 1\end{array}\end{array}\right\},\end{array}\end{eqnarray} \end{align*}
where cv characterizes the dipole-dipole interaction between S and I

(v) Magnetic hyperfine interaction (III) \begin{equation*} \begin{align*} \begin{eqnarray}&&\begin{array}{l}\langle {v}{^{\prime} }{\Lambda }{^{\prime} }{N}{^{\prime} }(S){J}{^{\prime} }(I){F}{^{\prime} }{M}_{F}{^{\prime} }|{C}_{\nu N}{T}^{1}(\hat{I})\\ \times {\rm{\ }}{T}^{1}(\hat{N})|v\Lambda N(S)J(I)F{M}_{F}\rangle \\ ={\delta }_{{v}{^{\prime} }v}{\delta }_{{\Lambda }{^{\prime} }\Lambda }{\delta }_{{N}{^{\prime} }N}{\delta }_{{F}{^{\prime} }F}{\delta }_{{M}_{F}{^{\prime} }{M}_{F}}{C}_{\nu N}\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times {(-1)}^{2J+{F}{^{\prime} }+I+{N}{^{\prime} }+1+S}{[N(N+1)(2N+1)]}^{1/2}\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times {\rm{\ }}{[(2{J}{^{\prime} }+1)(2J+1)I(I+1)(2I+1)]}^{1/2}\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times {\rm{\ }}\left\{\begin{array}{ccc}\begin{array}{c}I\\ {J}{^{\prime} }\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}J\\ I\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}{F}{^{\prime} }\\ 1\end{array}\end{array}\right\}\left\{\begin{array}{ccc}\begin{array}{c}N\\ {J}{^{\prime} }\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}J\\ {N}{^{\prime} }\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}S\\ 1\end{array}\end{array}\right\}.\end{array}\end{eqnarray} \end{align*} \tag{ B5 } \end{equation*}

(vi) Electronic spin Zeeman effect \begin{equation*} \begin{align*} \begin{eqnarray}&&\begin{array}{l}\langle {v}{^{\prime} }{\Lambda }{^{\prime} }{N}{^{\prime} }(S){J}{^{\prime} }(I){F}{^{\prime} }{M}_{F}{^{\prime} }|{g}_{S}{\mu }_{B}{T}^{1}(\hat{S})\\ \times {\rm{\ }}{T}_{p=0}^{1}(\hat{B})|v\Lambda N(S)J(I)F{M}_{F}\rangle \\ ={\delta }_{{v}{^{\prime} }v}{\delta }_{{\Lambda }{^{\prime} }\Lambda }{\delta }_{{N}{^{\prime} }N}{\delta }_{{M}_{F}{^{\prime} }{M}_{F}}{g}_{S}{\mu }_{B}{B}_{Z}\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times {(-1)}^{F-{M}_{F}+{F}{^{\prime} }+2J+I+N+S}{[(2J+1)(2{J}{^{\prime} }+1)S(S+1)]}^{1/2}\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times {\rm{\ }}{[(2S+1)(2F+1)(2{F}{^{\prime} }+1)]}^{1/2}\left\{\begin{array}{ccc}\begin{array}{c}J\\ S\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}S\\ {J}{^{\prime} }\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}N\\ 1\end{array}\end{array}\right\}\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times \left\{\begin{array}{ccc}\begin{array}{c}F\\ {J}{^{\prime} }\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}J\\ {F}{^{\prime} }\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}I\\ 1\end{array}\end{array}\right\}\left(\begin{array}{ccc}\begin{array}{c}F\\ -{M}_{F}\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}1\\ 0\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}{F}{^{\prime} }\\ {M}_{F}\end{array}\end{array}\right).\end{array}\end{eqnarray} \end{align*} \tag{ B6 } \end{equation*}

(vii) Nuclear spin Zeeman effect \begin{equation*} \begin{align*} \begin{eqnarray}&&\begin{array}{l}\langle {v}{^{\prime} }{\Lambda }{^{\prime} }{N}{^{\prime} }(S){J}{^{\prime} }(I){F}{^{\prime} }{M}_{F}{^{\prime} }|-{g}_{N}{\mu }_{N}{T}^{1}(\hat{I})\\ \times {\rm{\ }}{T}_{p=0}^{1}(\hat{B})|v\Lambda N(S)J(I)F{M}_{F}\rangle \\ ={\delta }_{{v}{^{\prime} }v}{\delta }_{{\Lambda }{^{\prime} }\Lambda }{\delta }_{{N}{^{\prime} }N}{\delta }_{{M}_{F}{^{\prime} }{M}_{F}}{g}_{N}{\mu }_{N}{B}_{Z}\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times {(-1)}^{F-{M}_{F}+F+J+I}{[(2F+1)(2{F}{^{\prime} }+1)]}^{1/2}\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times {[I(I+1)(2I+1)]}^{1/2}\\ {\rm{\ }}{\rm{\ }}\times {\rm{\ }}\left\{\begin{array}{ccc}\begin{array}{c}F\\ I\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}I\\ {F}{^{\prime} }\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}J\\ 1\end{array}\end{array}\right\}\left(\begin{array}{ccc}\begin{array}{c}F\\ -{M}_{F}\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}1\\ 0\end{array} & \begin{array}{c}{F}{^{\prime} }\\ {M}_{F}\end{array}\end{array}\right).\end{array}\end{eqnarray} \end{align*} \tag{ B7 } \end{equation*}
